title: Interpretation of dreams about my sister cutting my hair for a single woman

preview.html: If the dreamer is married, this indicates the positive changes that she will notice in her married life in the near future, God willing. Interpretation of seeing my sister cutting my hair in a dream about a single girl. If an unmarried girl dreams that her sister is cutting her hair in a dream and she is sad. It shows that she does not see the good things that Her sister does it for her in life. And seeing the single woman trying to beautify her sister’s hair while she is making a haircut in the dream. This is evidence that she is doing many things in her life, in order to make her sister very happy, and God knows best. And seeing the unmarried woman saw her sister cutting her hair, but that was bad. It is bad. It indicates a big problem that this sister will create for this only girl in her life. If an unmarried woman wants to cut her hair and her sister cuts it in the dream and she is happy. It indicates that she will achieve something that she feels is difficult in her life and it will make her happy, God willing. See also: Interpretation of a dream about long hair. Interpretation of seeing my sister She cuts my hair in a dream about a married woman. If a married woman sees her sister cutting her hair in a dream, and she looks beautiful, it announces the great happiness that this married woman will feel thanks to her sister. And if a married woman tries to cut her hair herself, her sister cuts it. It appears that she is facing some problems at the time. And her sister will help her get rid of it. Likewise, seeing a married woman trying to change her hair and her sister cutting it for her. Here is an indication of the beautiful life that the married woman will live, God willing. And if the married woman cuts her sister’s hair in a dream, this looks beautiful. It is interpreted that he is trying to prepare her for a life Beautiful, free of troubles and troubles, and God is Most High. Interpretation of seeing my sister cutting my hair in a dream for a divorced woman. If the divorced woman dreams that she is cutting her sister’s hair, but it looks bad. It shows that she will create a big problem in her sister’s life during this period of time. And if the divorced woman looks at her sister’s hair, then that is Bad in the dream and her story. This indicates that her sister is suffering from problems in her life and is trying to get rid of them. The same applies to the divorced woman who dreams that her sister cuts her hair and she is happy about it. This indicates that she will change a lot in her life and will live a better life, God willing. The divorced woman saw that her sister changed Her hairstyle and haircut in a dream. This is a sign of the new life that she and her sister will have, God willing. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about long black hair. Interpretation of seeing my sister cutting my hair in a dream about a man and its meaning. If a pregnant woman sees that his hair is long and his sister cuts it gently in the dream. It indicates that he will get married. A good woman in the near future, God willing. And if a man cuts his sister’s hair in a dream and it looks very bad in the dream. This is an indication that he will fall into trouble, and he will fight with his sister at this time. And seeing the dreamer who looks in the dream is scissors, to cut his sister’s hair in The dream. It shows that it prevents her from doing something important in her life and this will make her very sad. The dreamer who asks his sister in a dream to cut his hair in a distinctive and beautiful way. Indicating that he will deal with his life, and live happily, God willing. The meaning of seeing my sister cutting my hair in a dream Pregnant

title: What if you dreamed of a lion!  Learn about the legal interpretation. I saw a lion and dreamed of a lion chasing me and I dreamed of a big lion

preview.html: Seeing a lion in reality is not an easy thing, as we all fear it, even if it is behind iron and bars, but we find that seeing it in a dream varies depending on what the person is doing and whether he is attacking or playing. With him, so that we can understand what a dream of a lion refers to in a dream and what indicators it indicates in reality. I dreamed of a lion on the authority of Ibn Sirin. What if I dreamed of a lion? If the dreamer is riding on its back, this is a sign of his reaching a distinguished position and power that no one can reach easily. He made a great effort to achieve this. Seeing Assad entering a country and touring it indicates that its president will not remain in power again, but rather that he will change as soon as possible. Perhaps it expresses that the dreamer will be in a high position in the future if he continues with his determination, ambition, and correct thinking. To move towards his goal. His safe escape is an expression of ending all his sorrows and problems with wisdom and reason, and that he will not allow any pain in his life no matter what happens, and an indication of his success in life and this makes his future better. The dreamer’s marriage to his female in the vision is a confirmation of his great success and the righteousness of his life, which makes him He achieves what he thinks at the first opportunity, and if he sees that he has become a lion, it expresses his distinction in personality from him, and the success of the Lord of the Worlds in his life, as he is blessed with a lot of money that brings him happiness with his family. Fighting it may make him tired for a while, but he recovers from it, and if he sleeps next to him While he is reassured, this indicates his recovery from the disease that afflicted his body. If the dreamer sees that he is eating from his head, this is a sign that he will soon hear the news of his promotion to a high position of authority. If the dreamer confronts him without being afraid of him, this indicates his mentality and wisdom that will make him go out. One of the most difficult situations without anything bad happening to him. Meeting him while he is walking in the street shows that there is something that he fears inside him and he hopes that it will not happen so that it will not harm him in his next life because he is doing his best to prove the situation. Interpretation of a dream about a lion in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Our Sheikh Al-Nabulsi believes that there are happy meanings It is contradictory to see a lion in a dream. Among the positive meanings of this dream: Seeing him in a dream expresses strength and reaching an important position that he desired and fought hard for, so the dreamer feels happy because he was able to reach his goal. Seeing him is an expression of recovering from the problems he faces in life, and if the lion does not see him In his dream, he will be great and important, and he will not be exposed to any problems in his life. If the dreamer eats his own meat in a dream, this indicates his victory over everyone who opposes him, no matter how powerful he is, and that he will obtain huge sums of money that will make him rich. It has negative connotations, and it is auspicious: - A lion attack indicates... The dreamer indicates problems and defects that he may face in his life. Riding on his back while he is very afraid and anxious will lead him to evil without being able to get out of it, but he must try to escape from this evil. His vision may indicate injustice from an enemy who wants to bring misfortunes into his life. He should beware of everyone around him and his relatives without exception. I dreamed that a lion was chasing me. I dreamed that a lion was chasing me. The corridor. Interpretation of a dream about a lion chasing me. Nev.

title: Interpretation of the vision of pulling teeth by hand according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of pulling teeth by hand According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, pulling teeth by hand in a dream is one of the disturbing and frightening events that make the dreamer feel that he is harming himself and that he is getting it. Wrong decisions in his life that could affect his future. Seeing teeth in general in a dream is one of the dreams that most affects the critical events that have occurred in the dreamer’s life in the recent period, so in this article we will learn together the interpretation of the vision of extracting a tooth by hand according to Interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream to see a tooth extracted by hand in a dream. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin. This dream indicates that the dreamer will receive money from someone. Seeing a tooth from the hand or clothing indicates marriage to an unmarried man or the birth of a married woman. Seeing a tooth falling to the ground is a vision. Foul and unpleasant portends illness, God forbid. Al-Nabulsi said in this regard: Seeing the dreamer extracting his teeth with one hand after the other until it harms his children, and God knows best. Logic indicates making a decision without really thinking about it. Interpretation of a dream about extracting teeth in a dream for a single woman. After that, we provide an interpretation Dreams for an unmarried girl, for a girl who has not been married in the past, and she is extracting her tooth with her hand in a dream: The extraction of a tooth accompanied by blood loss indicates the approaching date of marriage, and it will be happy and successful by God’s command. The extraction of a tooth symbolizes the end of an engagement or romantic relationship that will lead to sadness and pain. As a result, the extraction of one of the lower teeth shows that it has changed its condition for the better. While the extraction of the upper tooth indicates getting into trouble or trouble and going through a difficult time in life, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about extracting teeth by hand for a married woman: This dream for a married woman sometimes carries with it good signs and sometimes Sadness, according to the events of the vision, which we will explain in the following points: Interpretation of the dream of extracting teeth by hand, and the married woman was barren and did not give birth, so it is good news of recovery and an example of conceiving good offspring by God’s command. Removing the lower part of her teeth with bleeding without pain symbolizes getting rid of disputes and problems. What she faces in her relationship with her husband and changing her condition to satisfaction and happiness. Interpretation of a dream about extracting teeth by hand for a pregnant woman: If the dreamer becomes pregnant and sees that she is extracting her tooth with her hand, then this dream is a bad omen that her fetus is bad, God forbid. Seeing a tooth falling on the garment without any blood accompanying it indicates the emergence of marital disputes that are bothering her. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a tooth extracted in a dream. In the following paragraph, we explain the meaning of seeing a dream in which a tooth is extracted from between one’s teeth: it indicates the dreamer getting out of the predicament from which he suffered, using his advantage without informing him. Extracting a healthy tooth indicates that the fortuneteller left something out. He wants it, but with his consent. Getting rid of a tooth infested with mites symbolizes the dreamer’s behavior toward a person he hates and causes him problems. Removing a tooth from the dreamer that has become infected indicates a solution to a crisis or problem that was preoccupying him and disturbing his comfort. Removing a tooth in a dream symbolizes progress in work or a job, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing teeth extracted by hand and putting them in a dream. The interpretation of this dream depends on...

title: Interpretations of Ibn Sirin regarding seeing vitiligo in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Usaimi

preview.html: Vitiligo in a dream: Seeing vitiligo is one of the visions that causes confusion and panic for some. Vitiligo is a condition in which the skin loses pigment cells, leading to the appearance of discolored spots. In this article, we review all cases and interpretations of vitiligo with more explanations and details. What is the interpretation of a dream about a snake in a dream? Seeing vitiligo expresses obstacles that discourage steps and hinder efforts, and the person overcomes them with wisdom and agility, and whoever sees his skin changing to another color, this indicates that There are changes in his life and sudden movements. If the skin color of the person he loves changes, this is a sign of kindness, livelihood, gains, and great benefit. Whoever sees vitiligo covering his head and face, this indicates excessive thinking, excessive anxiety, many worries and life’s annoyances, and he is immersed in actions and fears that have no beginning or End. If vitiligo is found in various places on the body, this indicates a jacket and clothing, and in some sayings, this vision expresses distress and sorrow, followed by comfort, comfort, and pleasure. Vitiligo in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that vitiligo does not indicate an evil, abomination, or a sinner. In many places, it is interpreted as goodness and contentment, changing circumstances during the night, offering rest and comfort, ending fears and removing obstacles. Whoever sees that the color of his skin has changed from one color to another, this indicates the changes and movements of life, and if the color change is desirable This is a change for the better. If a person sees his skin stained with colors, this indicates concealment and relief, and whoever sees that he has vitiligo in many parts of his body, this indicates that he puts on his clothes, emerges from the experience and overcomes obstacles and obstacles. From another point of view, this vision indicates There is a disagreement or dispute over inheritance, and disagreements with relatives, and the viewer may find it difficult to earn a living or be exposed to harassment that prevents him from doing so. Wants. The symbol of vitiligo in Al-Osaimi’s dream. Al-Osaimi says that vitiligo indicates a change from one condition to another or moving from one place to another, and whoever sees that there is a change in his skin, this indicates that his condition has changed for the better or for the worse depending on the color of the body and the extent of his desire. And whoever sees it in his head With an abundance of vitiligo, this indicates the vicissitudes of life, professions, harsh circumstances, and preoccupation with unresolved issues. If vitiligo spreads over the body, it symbolizes clothing, covering and removing obstacles and worries. If vitiligo is undesirable in its shape and form, then this is a sign of sadness, distress, and sadness that exceed the limit. What is the interpretation of vitiligo in a dream for a single woman? Seeing viburnum in a dream symbolizes harvesting a long-absent desire and obtaining great benefit from someone. If the color of viburnum is white like pure milk, then this is good and beloved for her according to some interpreters. But if it covers Vitiligo on her face, this indicates the critical situation and serious experiences and worries that overwhelm her and control her life, and she may think and worry about things that do not concern her or affect her badly. If she sees vitiligo on her body and does not feel bad and sad, this indicates

title: Interpretation of seeing a fall in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing falling in a dream According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, one of the frightening dreams that appear to some during their sleep are dreams in which they see themselves in danger or falling from a patchy place. A period and it will affect him a lot, so in this article we will tell you the interpretation of seeing a fall in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Interpretation of a dream of seeing a fall in a dream: Seeing a dream of falling from a high place, and that place was beautiful, then falling from it to a bad place. This vision indicates the failure of the visionary and his inability to achieve his goals. This vision also indicates that the person with the vision will receive a lot of money, and will be promoted at work. Another interpretation of this vision is that it expresses a major change in the circumstances of the visionary from all sides. It indicates Seeing falling from a high place also indicates that many problems and crises are approaching the dreamer’s life. If someone sees in a dream that he will fall from a high place in a dream, then this vision indicates that he is confused about something in his life and is unable to make a decision. As Seeing a fall in a dream symbolizes the dreamer’s escape from dealing with all his problems and crises. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a fall from the stairs in a dream: If someone sees him falling down the stairs. This vision expresses the emergence of some major problems in the visionary’s life at the work level. Seeing falling from a ladder in a dream also indicates a state of separation occurring between family members due to distance from religion. If the dreamer sees another person falling down the stairs. This vision shows the dreamer's love for this person. As for seeing the dreamer being saved by another person who falls down the stairs. This vision symbolizes that he needs the help of a fortuneteller to overcome his crises. Interpretation of a dream about escaping from falling in a dream. If a person sees in a dream that he is escaping from death and does not fall, then this vision symbolizes the dreamer’s connection to his work, wealth, love for his family, and preserving it. Interpretation of dreams about seeing falling In a dream, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, seeing falling from above in a dream indicates the next new stage in the dreamer’s life. Another interpretation is that seeing falling represents punishment from the subconscious for the visions. But if one sees himself in a dream, he will die. This vision expresses that the dreamer will soon be relieved of all crises and problems in his life. If you see a fall in a dream with blood flowing. The vision is a sign of freedom from all worry and worry. If someone sees in a dream that he is falling from the roof of his house. This vision indicates that he will move to another house. Interpretation of dreams about seeing children falling in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Seeing a child falling in a dream is one of the unwanted visions that express the coming of some bad things in the dreamer’s life and also expresses that he will be exposed to a financial crisis in the coming period. But if one sees a child falling from above, the fortuneteller picks him up and saves him. This vision symbolizes that the dreamer will get rid of all problems and crises in his life. If a married woman sees in a dream that her child is falling from above. This vision expresses the extent of this mother’s fears for her child in the future. Another interpretation of seeing a child

If the dreamer sees another person falling down the stairs. This vision shows the dreamer's love for this person. As for seeing the dreamer being saved by another person who falls down the stairs. This vision symbolizes that he needs the help of a fortuneteller to overcome his crises. Interpretation of a dream about escaping from falling in a dream. If a person sees in a dream that he is escaping from death and does not fall, then this vision symbolizes the dreamer’s connection to his work, wealth, love for his family, and preserving it. Interpretation of dreams about seeing falling In a dream, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, seeing falling from above in a dream indicates the next new stage in the dreamer’s life. Another interpretation is that seeing falling represents punishment from the subconscious for the visions. But if one sees himself in a dream, he will die. This vision expresses that the dreamer will soon be relieved of all crises and problems in his life. If you see a fall in a dream with blood flowing. The vision is a sign of freedom from all worry and worry. If someone sees in a dream that he is falling from the roof of his house. This vision indicates that he will move to another house. Interpretation of dreams about seeing children falling in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Seeing a child falling in a dream is one of the unwanted visions that express the coming of some bad things in the dreamer’s life and also expresses that he will be exposed to a financial crisis in the coming period. But if one sees a child falling from above, the fortuneteller picks him up and saves him. This vision symbolizes that the dreamer will get rid of all problems and crises in his life. If a married woman sees in a dream that her child is falling from above. This vision expresses the extent of this mother’s fears for her child in the future. Another interpretation of seeing a child

title: Interpretation of a dream about a pregnant girl

preview.html: The dreamer sees that she is pregnant and her belly is large and she is single, so it is interpreted that she will make mistakes in her life, even if her belly is small, she looks good. Interpretation of seeing pregnancy in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried girl sees that she is pregnant by a stranger in a dream and feels sorry. It shows that she will get involved in a matter. It is difficult in her life and will make her very sad. Likewise, seeing the unmarried girl who knew that she was pregnant in the dream, and she was crying loudly. This is evidence that he will fall into distress at this time and feel very sorry for her, and God knows best. And the unmarried woman who saw that she was pregnant, She was holding her stomach tightly in the dream, and she was very afraid. This means that she is clinging to her religion and trying to succeed in doing good deeds. And seeing a single girl in a dream, and that she was pregnant with a girl, and she was very sad in the dream. This is a sign of the extreme sadness that this single girl is experiencing In her life, and God knows best. And the unmarried woman who saw that she was pregnant with a small butt in the dream, and the dream did not appear on her. The meaning shows the good that God Almighty is striving to achieve at this time. See also: Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy by Ibn Sirin. A single girl is pregnant and in pain. If the girl sees that she Pregnant and in a dream she is in a lot of pain from pregnancy and she is very tired. This indicates the many problems that she is trying to get rid of and stay away from now. An unmarried woman who saw that she was pregnant in the past few days, and she was suffering from severe pain from fatigue. This is an indication of the presence of a predicament in her life. She tries to escape from him, but she cannot. A single girl sees that she is pregnant by her fiancé in a dream and this hurts a lot. It is interpreted to mean that she will face many difficulties in this period of her life. The unmarried dreamer who saw in the dream that she was suffering from severe pain In the dream. Here is a clear interpretation that she is trying to hold on to something in her life and not give it up. An unmarried woman who learns in a dream that she is newly pregnant, and she dreamed of her pregnancy in the dream. This means that she is holding on to something real in her life and is not giving up her right in this matter. Vision A pregnant girl had a miscarriage. If an unmarried girl sees that she has had a miscarriage in a dream and she has been pregnant for the past few months. The meaning indicates that she will participate in a difficult subject in her studies and it will bother him. Seeing a single woman looking at the pregnancy coming out of her stomach, and feeling very tired. Clear evidence that she She lost something big in her life, and she will be sad for some time to come. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream means that she dreams that she had an abortion, and this is in the early days. A sign that she is trying to do something that she was trying to do at some point in her life. The only dreaming girl who had an abortion in a dream was to get rid of the pregnancy in the dream. This indicates that she will do bad things in her life, and God knows best. And the unmarried woman who saw in a dream that she was pregnant in the last months and had an abortion. Here it indicates that she will face great distress in her life, and it will affect It has a lot on it

title: Interpretation of a dream about lemon in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about lemon in a dream for Al-Asimi: Seeing lemon is a very confusing dream. This dream has many different meanings. For example, your vision of selling lemons is different from your vision of selling or buying lemons. You may also be interested in knowing the bedroom in a dream, so it is necessary to know the correct interpretation of such dreams, and God knows best. Let us take a quick tour to learn about the most important interpretations of a dream about lemons. Interpretation of a dream about lemons in a dream by Al-Osaimi. Lemon in a dream indicates a rich harvest of money and a lawful life, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing lemons in a girl’s dream by Al-Osaimi. The meaning of seeing lemons in a dream for a girl shows independence and strength of character. Interpretation of a vision of lemons In a pregnant woman’s dream of Al-Osaimi, seeing yellow lemons in a pregnant woman’s dream symbolizes health problems during the months of pregnancy. Interpretation of a dream about lemon in a dream for Al-Osaimi. Interpretation of seeing a lemon in a dream for Al-Osaimi, especially if it is green in color, is a very special dream. And when you see that you are eating lemon and its taste is bitter, one of the dreams Unpleasant, it expresses the loss of money or the loss of work, as it expresses many crises that you will go through in the coming period, and God knows best. But if you eat lemon and its taste is nice, then it is one of the good dreams that express hearing a lot of happy news in the near future, but also happiness. Which will overwhelm you and your family in the near future. Seeing lemon in a dream for a married woman: This dream basically shows that she is suffering from many problems in her life and that she will be able to overcome these adversities easily. If she sees lemon juice in her dream, this is evidence that she will get a lot of happiness. Comfort, and this vision also shows that she will get a lot of money in the future. Seeing green lemons is a sign that her life has changed for the better, and that she will soon get a lot of money, and God knows best. And if you think that her husband is the one who gives her green lemons, this indicates On the great love between her and her husband, and the lemon tree in a dream shows good relations between her and those around her, and God knows best. As for the one who sees her picking yellow lemons and eating them, this dream is one of the negative dreams that express that he will be exposed to some health problems in the near future and seeing her picking Lemon is one of the most promising dreams you have. It indicates that she will become pregnant soon, and that her birth will be easy, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of dreams of heavy rain in a dream. One dream with lemons. If she sees that she is eating an amount of green lemons, this is an expression of her good morals and that she has a good reputation among the people, and this vision also expresses that she You will get a lot of money soon. And God knows best. And if he sees that he is eating a yellow lemon, this is an indication that in the future he will be exposed to some health diseases, but he will be able to get rid of these diseases and he will recover, God willing. He knows better. But if she sees that she is eating green lemons, then it is one of the good dreams that express that she will achieve what she desires and will be able to achieve it.

title: Learn the interpretation of a dream about driving a bus according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about driving a bus: Seeing a bus in a dream symbolizes many signs of kindness and good news for its owner, whether he is a man, woman, or a single girl, and we will explain all of their interpretations in detail in the following article. Interpretation of a dream about driving a bus: Seeing a bus trip in a dream symbolizes goodness, blessings, and good news that he will hear. The dreamer will soon, God willing. The dream of a person driving a bus in a dream indicates good health and a long life for the pioneer, God willing. But if the dreamer sees himself driving a bus in a dream and he is with people he does not like, then this is a sign of evil people who are plotting conspiracies and hypocrites who surround him. Seeing the dreamer in a dream driving a bus is a sign that his life and personality will also change for the better, God willing. If the dreamer sees himself riding a bus in a dream, this is a sign of successes and successes that will meet him in the coming period, God Almighty willing, and if the bus is fast, this A sign that he is a reckless person. He makes reckless decisions that expose him to trouble and sadness in the coming period. Also, seeing a person driving a bus at high speed is a sign that he is committing sins and transgressions. Interpretation of a dream about driving a bus by Ibn Sirin: Seeing Ibn Sirin driving a bus in a dream symbolizes the happiness and stability in which he lives with his family. The slogan of driving the bus to the solution indicates the goodness and great food that will come to him, God willing. Seeing someone driving a bus in a dream and it was full, is a sign that the person is surrounded by people who do not represent him in any way. But in the event that you are driving a bus in a dream of immigration, this is a sign that the person is surrounded by people who do not represent him in any way. A sign that the fortuneteller does not find a job for success and that he is always busy looking for an opportunity to change his lifestyle and develop for the better. When seeing the person driving the bus who has even numbers, this indicates that he will soon marry a beautiful girl. Interpretation of seeing riding the bus in a dream for a son Shaheen: The scholar Ibn Shaheen explained that seeing a bus ride in a dream is a sign of good news and success in the future, God willing. As for seeing a bus traveling quickly and recklessly, this is a sign of wrong decisions made by the dreamer. Also, seeing a dream about a bus trip and after an accident occurs is an indication of crises. And the problems that the dreamer is exposed to in this period of his life, or committing some forbidden actions. Seeing a person in a dream riding a bus and seeing a girl waiting for him, this is a sign that he will marry this girl soon if he meets her. Interpretation of a dream about driving a bus for a single woman: Seeing one girl driving a bus in a dream It symbolizes progress and successes in this period of her life. Seeing an unrelated girl driving a bus in a dream means that she will soon get a good job opportunity or a promotion in recognition of her hard work. For a single woman to dream of driving a bus means that she will soon be blessed with abundant money and an abundance of goodness. God willing. Seeing a girl driving a bus in a dream means that she will soon marry a good young man and live a decent life with him. As for...

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a corpse in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a dead body in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen Seeing the bosom of the dead in a dream is one of the dreams that has many interpretations given by interpretation scholars, and many people seek to interpret the dream of seeing the bosom of the dead in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen, as he is considered one of the most famous dream interpreters in The Arab world, the dream is one of the frightening and frightening dreams that carry evil. The interpretation of the dream of seeing a corpse in a dream. Many well-known interpreters in the Arab countries interpreted the dream of embracing the dead in a dream, because it varies according to social status, and the interpretation of the dream of seeing the embrace of the dead in a dream is as follows: Seeing a person In a dream that a dead person embraces him with love indicates the longevity of the dreamer. If the hug is sad and anxious, this indicates unpleasant things. Traveling with the deceased to another place indicates the obstacles and difficulties he faces in his life. Seeing a father embracing a married woman indicates abundance The goodness that enters her home and the abundance of livelihood. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a corpse in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Imam Ibn Sirin is considered one of the most famous dream interpretation scholars, as he interpreted the embrace of the dead in a dream, which carries different connotations. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the dream of seeing the embrace of the dead was as follows: Embracing The deceased father of a married woman is evidence of stability, happiness, and the end of marital disputes. The deceased is smiling and happy, indicating good luck and happy news. The deceased is angry and sad, indicating that the visionary is going through a difficult period of pain and sadness. The mother sitting at home indicates the coming of goodness and blessing in money and children. Hugging a dead grandfather indicates happiness and contentment. Interpretation of dreams of seeing Ibn Shaheen hugging a dead person in a dream. The dream of seeing the embrace of the dead in a dream is considered one of the frightening dreams that bring good news to reality in the near future, which is what was interpreted by the scholar Ibn Shaheen, and the interpretation of hugging the dead in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. As follows: Seeing a dead person happy indicates that the person enjoys happiness and family and marital stability. Seeing the dead quarreling with the living indicates the dreamer’s bad behavior or distance from God’s approach. The dead person’s longing for the living and the desire to take him with him indicates the death of the coming monarch. Hugging and talking With a deceased married woman, it indicates a long life and an improvement in her living conditions. Interpretation of hugging a dead person for a single girl: Some unmarried girls dream of hugging a dead person in a dream, which carries within it many things that may happen in the near future, and the interpretation of a dream about hugging a dead person for a single girl is as follows: Hugging the dead In the dream of an unmarried woman, it means that she will achieve and achieve her goals. It indicates her longevity. Embracing the dead with a feeling of anxiety and sadness indicates problems and worries. If a girl sees that a dead person hugged her and gave her something, this indicates her closeness to marriage. Embracing the dead in a dream for a married woman is considered The dream of hugging a deceased person in a dream for a married woman is one of the dreams that indicate getting rid of sadness and getting rid of worries in the near future. Hugging a dead person

title: Dreams show that prayer is answered

preview.html: Dreams indicate the response to supplication through the vision website roy2a.com. Supplication is one of the acts of worship that brings the servant closer to his Lord, and the Messenger Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace, encouraged it in many honorable prophetic hadiths, including the saying of the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace. May God bless him and grant him peace, “Whoever among you opens the door of supplication, the doors of mercy will be opened for him, and nothing is asked of him more dear to God than asking for good.” Today, through this article, we will present to youDreams show that prayer is answeredFor great interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Katheer and other dream interpretation scholars, follow us. Dreams show that prayer is answeredSeeing a prophet speaking in a dream and answering the dreamer's prayer, and God knows best. The supplication of the patient recovers a lot in a dream and indicates that God will heal him soon from this disease, and God knows best. Seeing her crying in front of the mosque and opening the door of the mosque in a dream indicates that God will respond to the visionary and accept his supplication, and God knows best. See another interpretation: Dreams of divorceDreams show the answer to prayer for Ibn SirinIbn Sirin explained the vision of finding paper money in a dream, and it indicates the answer to the dreamer's prayer for relief and livelihood in the coming season. Seeing recurring dreams in which the dreamer feels comfortable indicates the answer to prayer, and God knows best. Eating the food that the dreamer loves in a dream indicates that God will answer the prayer that the dreamer has been asking for for a long time. Rain falling in a dream is the answer to prayer, and God knows best. Seeing the dreamer putting his hand on the wall of the Kaaba in a dream indicates that God pleases him by satisfying desires and answering Supplication and God knows best. See another interpretation: Dreams indicate longevity Dreams indicate that supplication is answered for the single Seeing an unmarried woman kneeling or bowing in a dream indicates that her supplications will be answered soon and God knows best. Giving alms to a single dream announces the acceptance of her supplication and her abundant provision and God knows best. Seeing an unmarried woman entering light from her room in a dream announces that her prayers for marriage will enjoy a righteous husband with whom she will live a happy and stable life. If an unmarried woman sees in a dream her prayers for healing without tears, this indicates that God will heal her from illness and answer her supplications. Dreams indicate that the supplication of a married woman will be answered Seeing a married woman in the rain in a dream indicates the answer to her prayers for her children in the coming period and God knows best. Crying and supplication in the sleep of a married woman indicates that God will provide her with help and living in reality and answer her supplications. A married woman sees her husband giving birth to her in a dream indicates that her supplication will come and she will become pregnant soon and God knows best. See another interpretation: Dreams indicate excessive wealth Dreams indicate that Prayer is answered for the pregnant woman Seeing a pregnant woman crying loudly in a dream indicates that her prayers are accepted and that she will go through an easy and smooth birth process. If a pregnant woman sees that her husband is giving her money, she feels happy in the dream and this indicates her pleas for an easy and painless birth and God knows best. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream praying Fajr indicates that all her prayers

For great translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and other dream interpretation scholars, follow us. Dreams show that prayer is answered. Seeing a prophet speaking in a dream and answering the dreamer’s prayer, and God knows best. The sick person’s prayer that he recovers greatly in a dream and indicates that May God heal him soon from this disease, and God knows best. Seeing her crying in front of the mosque and opening the door of the mosque in a dream indicates that God will respond to the pioneer and accept his prayers, and God knows best. See another interpretation: Dreams of divorce. Dreams show the answer to prayers by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained the vision of finding paper money in A dream indicates an answer to the dreamer’s prayer for relief and sustenance in the coming season. Seeing recurring dreams in which the dreamer feels comfortable indicates an answer to prayer, and God knows best. Eating food that the dreamer loves in a dream indicates that God will answer the prayer that the dreamer has been asking for for a long time. Rain falling in a dream, which indicates an answer to the dreamer’s prayer for relief and sustenance in the coming season. Answering prayer, and God knows best. Seeing the dreamer placing his hand on the wall of the Kaaba in a dream indicates that God will satisfy him by satisfying his desires and answering prayers, and God knows best. See another interpretation: Dreams indicate longevity. Dreams indicate that prayers are answered for a single person. Seeing an unmarried woman kneeling or bending over in a dream indicates... That her prayers will be answered soon, and God knows best. Giving charity for one dream announces the acceptance of her prayers and that she will be provided abundantly, and God knows best. Seeing an unmarried woman entering a light from her room in a dream announces that her prayer for marriage will enjoy a good husband with whom she will live a happy and stable life. If an unmarried woman sees her prayer in a dream With recovery without tears, this indicates that God will heal her from the disease and answer her prayers. Dreams indicate an answer to prayers for a married woman. Seeing a married woman under the rain in a dream indicates an answer to her prayers for her children in the coming period, and God knows best. Crying and praying in a married woman’s sleep indicates that God will provide for her. Help and live in reality and respond to her prayers. A married woman sees her husband giving birth to her in a dream. It indicates that her prayers will come and she will get pregnant soon, and God knows best. See another interpretation: Dreams indicate excessive wealth. Dreams indicate that prayers are answered for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman crying loudly in a dream indicates the acceptance of her prayer and its passing. With an easy and easy birth process. If a pregnant woman sees that her husband is giving her money, she feels happy in the dream, and this indicates her calls for an easy and pain-free birth, and God knows best. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream praying Fajr, this indicates that all her prayers will be fulfilled.
